get_connected.title: Get connected
get_connected.description: We’re here to help if you’ve hit an issue or even if you just have a question about CDAP.

items.title: Ask a question
items.body: You get in touch with the community using any of the following channels:

items.title: Report a bug
items.body: To report bugs, please use the Jira issue tracker. We recommend you to post your issues to the mailing list, and report a bug if it is confirmed as an issue there.

items.title: Join the BDAM group
items.body: The Big Data Application Meetup is a community focused on solving real world problems using Big Data technologies.

contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.description: The CDAP community welcomes and greatly appreciates your contributions. To get started, view our contributing guide. Here are a few ways you can contribute to CDAP:

items.title: Get familiar
items.body: Fix a newbie issue, to get familiar with the process of contributing to CDAP

items.title: Submit a proposal
items.body: Review existing design proposals, or submit your own proposal for a new feature or an improvement

items.title: Create a pull request
items.body: Contribute to core CDAP, pipeline plugin, documentation or the Hub

items.title: Verify your code
items.body: Using our build system to run unit and integration tests, as well as download the latest build

twitter.title: Stay informed
twitter.description: Stay informed about the latest news and announcements by following us on Twitter, subscribing to our YouTube channel, or meeting us at meetups and conferences.
